meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> <radical>wrap</radical>s around itself, the resulting wave will create a lot of <kanji>bubbles</kanji>. You know how tsunamis wrap around once gravity kicks in, right? Well when that wave crashes, a whole lot of bubbles are created.
readingMnemonic: One of the biggest <kanji>bubbles</kanji> heads straight for your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう), engulfs it, and picks it up into the air!
